text: <s>[INST] What is the capital of France? [/INST] The capital of France is Paris. </s>

<s>[INST] Explain the concept of photosynthesis in simple terms. [/INST] Photosynthesis is the process plants use to turn sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide into their food (sugar) and release oxygen. </s>

<s>[INST] Write a short poem about a rainy day. [/INST] Gray clouds gather, skies weep low,
Pitter-patter, soft and slow.
Raindrops dance on window pane,
Washing world all clean again. </s>
